thread.title: OPEC Hosts Meeting With Oil Officials From Non-Member States
thread.title_full: OPEC Hosts Meeting With Oil Officials From Non-Member States - WSJ

author: Benoît Faucon
title: OPEC Hosts Meeting With Oil Officials From Non-Member States
text:
VIENNA—The Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries is holding an unusual meeting Wednesday with oil officials from non-member states like Russia and Mexico in a bid to forge a common response to fallen oil prices.
But OPEC officials said that the meeting is unlikely to yield an agreement by all to pull back on production. Russia, the world’s largest oil producer, has said it isn’t interested in cooperation, and the Persian...
